imdb.plot outline: What do you get when you mix kids, teens, and everything else? Well, kids from 5 to 17 are here to tell you all about it through fun games, workshops, skits, and the showcasing of incredible, and sometimes not-so incredible talents. Watch as both you and the kids laugh, learn, and engage as the competitors duke out.
imdb.title: Project Mini Challenge: Kids
plot: What do you get when you mix kids, teens, and everything else? Well, kids from 5 to 17 are here to tell you all about it through fun games, workshops, skits, and the showcasing of incredible, and sometimes not-so incredible talents.::BurstOut Magazine
